author: enzagaray
title: NFT MARKETPLACE LATIN AMERICA
description: Registering in an nftstore requires validating the account and for that you have to send ada and pay a fee
solution: A marketplace latino where the account registration is done by human work and there is no fee to pay.
experience: Every time we had to validate an account in any application we had to send ADA and pay the fee. The ADAs return, the fee does not
